location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Captain Charles Sealy, Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, refers to the recent agreement between the Shaikh of Bahrein [Bahrain] and Rahma Bin Jauber [Rahma bin Jabir]. In addition, he refers to the Shaikh's intentions to chastise the tribe of Aboosennate and requests that any of the boats or people of Bahrein employed in hostilities against that tribe be left alone.
